comment.author: 47592210@N04
comment._content: I prefer this rock-strewn fountain to the current, more sedate, sandstone one. I wonder if the Hobart City Council has taken photos such as this into account in their plans for Franklin Square redevelopment.

comment.author: 99479038@N00
comment._content: Location should read - Hobart, Tasmania, Australia

comment.author: 47592210@N04
comment._content: The hill in the background is Battery Point. The warehouses are Salamanca Place.
